official_title: Pharmacokinetics and Metabolism of [14C] BMS-986205 in Healthy Male Participants
inclusion_criteria:
* Body weight 75-95kg, BMI 18.0-32.0 kg/m^2
* Refrain from sperm donation 110 days after dosing
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be MALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 50 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Current or recent gastrointestinal disease
* Any GI surgery that could impact drug absorption
* Active, known, or suspected autoimmune disease

Other protocol defined inclusion/exclusion criteria could apply
